title: Pharmacy inventory map
author: Alberta Blue Cross; Https; Www Ab Bluecross Ca
description: The pharmacy inventory map shows where you can find vaccines, medications and COVID-19 rapid testing kits in Alberta.
cleaned_text: Pharmacy inventory map Last updated: September 11, 2023 at 11:32 a.m. MT Find a pharmacy The pharmacy inventory map shows where you can find vaccines, medications and COVID-19 rapid testing kits in Alberta. Enter an address or postal code into the search bar on the map, or use the filters to find pharmacies in your area with availability. View results in a list Legend 0-9 pharmacies in region 10-99 pharmacies in region 100+ pharmacies in region Current Location Search result Pharmacy For the best experience, [use one of our supported browsers](https://www.ab.bluecross.ca/browser-support.php) to find a pharmacy. Sorry, there are currently no results for this criteria.
